title: if company / factory establishment proposes to construct staff quarters for their staff on their own land and such construction which is meant to be used for only staff quarters and not for sale of tenements / flats
clause_text: if company / factory establishment proposes to construct staff quarters for their staff on their own land and such construction which is meant to be used for only staff quarters and not for sale of tenements / flats. lands reserved in Development Plan which are being developed under Accommodation Reservation policy.
